content.detailedDescription:
Ok ill start by saying i was coming come from shell gas station on rt. 33 in twin rivers nj. i was on cedarville road and got to the end. i turned left onto windsor-perrinville road, east windsor, and started driving for my road. as i was headed for my road i see a light through the trees in the eastern skyies. i dismiss totally as the moon and i look back down at my iphone. i was listening to the espn radio app. then as i get to a place where the trees stop, i live my small farms so fields around me and flat land. well the trees stop and then i see it, and it was gigantic. it was at the height of when you see a low flying plane. it was four lights across in a row maybe bout the size of half a football field. the two in the middle were very bright almost like it's headlights but the light was very diffused. the craft was coming from the se goin nw and moving incredibly slow. as far as shape, i really couldn't tell because the lights were like so bright, it was like when headlights are close to you all u see is the object and can't make out the object behind them.

never have i seen an airplane creep along in the sky or also be that damn huge. it seems like a cruise liner in the sky. so i see it on windsor-perrineville road and then i turn on to my road park sideway. now i'm speeding trying to get home. i was terrified, this thing was huge and it gave me the like worst feeling, it had like a low hum. i felt so scared and alos hot all over. so i raced home and i cowardly didnt get a pic, even though getting a picture wasn;t crossing my stupifyied mind when im watching this thing. so i race up my driveway use the clicker for my door and stop right before i go into the garage (my little bit of courage). i look up to see the craft going not over my house but close i guess like adjacent. that's when i saw the blinking red light on the bottom of the craft... 

so i obviously wake my mom up, shes a scientist and is sketipic but could tell that i was very raddled. we go back out in the car and look for the object but cant find it. i come home and immediatley search "nj ufos" and i find an article from three days ago. about people on the turnpike seeing something similar. that's when i was shocked because i read words in the article which seemed to be spot on to what i saw. they descibed it as being moon like too which was creepy but the big kicker is that they reported the blinking red light on the bottom going every 3 seconds. i didn't measure or time it out but that seems correct. the pictures looked like what i saw but from a very far distance, but i could see a camera making it look like that blended the four lights together to look like a bright one. i then actually emailed roger marsh the author of the article because i didn't know where to tell this was my immediate idea. 




here's what i wrote via copy paste.



[name removed/cms/tg] to tremontavenue
show details 12:50 am (9 hours ago)
hi there

my name is [name removed/cms/tg]. i just saw the most gigantic thing in the sky i have ever seen, i was driving home from rt. 33 in twin rivers nj and i started seeing a light through the trees i thought it was the moon because of the size. as i got closer and to a treeless section, my house is my fields, i saw this gigantic object.. it was four lights across and i really couldnt make out the shape but it was huge...I mistaked it for the moon. also the two lof the lights in front werre lighting up infront of it almost headlight like but not really. i was terrifed, i had an omminous feeling iver never felt and i just raced up..There was a car behind me they had to of seen this thing. i jsut saw it like 30 min ago its 12:46 am on jun 22. i didnt snap a pic becuase of my fear and raced to my house i opend my garage door with the clicker to see the craft pass over top not like right over top my house but adjacent..I saw the bottom of the craft had a red blinking light..Now comes the reason im eamiling you..I searched nj ufo and saew the articel u did from 3 days ago about the turnpike ufo ppl saw.. what i saw was brigth as hell like that also i saw that they spoke of the same blinking light on the bttm..Also i live bout 3 miles from the turnpike exit 8...Im srry my grammar is bad an my sentence structure but i dont know where to report this thing..I dont think it was a pyramid or triangle but more flat but like i said i couldnt see shape i saw four lights in a line. like o o o o and the o were like the bright headlight type things. i don't know where to report this if you can give me information. that thing was gigantic..

 reply
 forward
roger marsh        
[name removed/cms/tg] - thanks for writing. please report your ufo experience at the mutual uf...
1:51 am (8 hours ago)
reply
[name removed/cms/tg] to roger
show details 1:55 am (8 hours ago)
i will report tomorrow..I'm just stunned that they are real i've always believed but to see was crazy like a cruise liner in the sky also there was a hum maybe a freq made me feel so terrified i feel like such a coward that i didn't get a picture..I'm down for an interview but first i got to get some sleep ty for reponding fast.

sent from my iphone
- show quoted text -
 reply
 forward
reply
roger marsh to me
show details 2:05 am (8 hours ago)
thanks, [name removed/cms/tg]. get some sleep. i just walked in the door and checked my email before going to bed. glad to have responded so fast. my personal sighting was incredible too - was within 30 feet of a disc-shaped object. wild. talk soon. let me know when you're up for a chat. thanks for filing the report tomorrow.


now i'm just like incredibly interested in what i saw. it really had like a military feel to it and the blinking red light i think kinda leans toward that way. but really i want to get across that it had a very dark ominous feeling and was terrified by the sheer size. i have always believed and been curious about ufos and read the internet article here or there but i'm like really happy to know now that they're real. truthfully i thought if i ever saw one it would be from far and maybe a cool color changing thing but no what i saw was a.) close b.) gigantic and c.)bright white lights almost like a airplanes but like 3 times as bright. also i'm now just even more curious to see if anyone else reports this..There was a car behind me at the time on windsor-perrineville they had to of seen this thing it was huge and incredibly bright, again i mistaken it for the moon so there you go. i'm a filmmaker and would like to investigate all of nj's cases and would happy to do a phone interview or talk with whoever. this was scary in person but exciting after the fact, very happy that they're true.

-[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: What i thought was the moon through the trees was not but a gigantic craft

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 3:25 am eastern time on june 11, 2011 i witnessed a classic v shaped ufo sighting. the lights were traveling at a high rate of speed coming out of the southwest traveling in a northeast direction. there were either 9 or 11 lights in this formation. i didn���t have a chance to count them because of the shock factor involved. the lights were not connected and seem to fly independently due to their movement. they also did not flash and had the consistentsy of a medium bright star. the flight pattern was similar to the way a flock of geese flies but much faster and absolutely no sound. the path would of taken them between downtown orlando and  the orlando international airport. i am located 1 mile due east of sea world orlando in the williamsburge subdivision and was facing due south when i began to see the lights at about 30 degrees on the horizon moving from my right to left. i followed them for approximately 12 to 15 seconds until the disappeared behind a tree in my neighbors yard. i believed the lights stayed at a constant speed during my sighting. they appeared to move a little faster the closer they got to my position and slowed down slightly when they passed me. my best guess at the altitude of the lights was around 5000 feet. i also estimate the lights were moving approximately 400 to 500 mph. i calculated this by watching commercial planes fly over and estimated their speed and altitude. the distance from the front light to the back lights was approximately 1600 feet. each light i guess was 400 feet apart.  i���ve never seen anything like this in real life only watching shows on tv about ufo���s which always capture my attention. i did notice a single similar light several months ago which moved slower and at a higher altitude. i figured it was probably a satellite traveling west south west and didn���t think anything else about it. although it was pretty neat.  this recent incident was much more convincing of a ufo sighting and made the hairs on my arms stand. i���ve always believed in ufo���s and now i���m 110% sure they exist. i walk the dog every night around this same time and gaze into the stars to see if i see anything out of the ordinary. my patience has paid off into an experience i will never forget. i will continue looking at the stars, for what i witnessed was amazing.
content.summary: Absolutely silent and fast moving v shaped formation

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back yard looking at the stars, at night i always have my flash light and would shine it stright up and just all about the sky. i looked to the west and saw 2 bright object side by side headed my way like they were going to go over my head and i flashed my flashlght at them and they kept coming no noise and not very high at all maybe 200 yards up, no blinking lights on any of them. then they started to move to the north-east, and started to dim there lights so you could barley see them, and they were out of sight at a steady pace. when i looked at my time it was 10:37 pm, and they were gone. where there came from there a big supermarket and hopefully someone else saw them.
i thought they were flying saucer, because they made no noise and had no blinking lights.
i could't belive, i thought i was going to get a real good look at them, and when they went the other way i felt empty i thought i was going to make contact for some reason.
content.summary: 2 objects coming from the west, and were side by side, and both were bright, as they kept moving east they started to dim there lights and went north-east and out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
While i was outside enjoying the solstice and as the light dimmed i scanned the sky for lights. there were three moving at once although i figure they were planes. as i saw the forth one which actually was moving faster than the other "planes" a bright flash of light revealed what i perceived as a craft shaped like two v wings put together one smaller than the other, like four points on the wing but distinct wings . . . like two triangles, or boomerangs put together.

as the flash got brighter it started to move into the dipper of the big dipper. as it moved in the flash diminished yet i could still see its faint movement as the light dies down. they always seem to enter that way or even when they leave just opposite. they enter with a bright flash and light and move to their flight pattern. cloaking or just powering down changes the intensity of the crafts  . . . well, for lack of a better word, their light. they dim completely away and cannot see them after a bit but usually i can follow them as they dim. they slow down at that point.

it was way up and the "dipper" was 88 to 90 degrees in the western sky. the tip of the handle being at 90 degrees, maybe 93 so that's where the flash was tonight. i believe that their activity will pick up again as it did last year june 27th. it's thereafter that i had 33 plus sightings ending around november 3rd.
content.summary: A flash of star like light v shaped ship moving through the big dipper

content.detailedDescription:
So it all started when my daughter and i were standing in the road talking to my mother. we live right in the middle of wilmington ohio, when we my daughter spotted a yelowish orange sphere in the night sky about 3 to 4 thousand feet  in the air. we watched as it crossed wilmington thinking it may have been air care ,but it moved slower than a helicopter.As we waited for sound to come there was nuthing to be heard. it did not stay in one straight line, as it moved in an erratic motion. againg with no noise what so ever . we observed it for 10 to 15 seconds as it crossed clinton county.

         i kept trying to tell myself that this was nothing but somekind of air plane or helicopter ,but i think that all 3 of us really knew what this thing was it had no marker lights at all just a big orange sphere in the sky . once it flew from one side of the sky to the other it mysteriously dissapeared in the sky as it shot itself forward toward sabina, ohio . then  i never saw the object reappear . i was in totally shock as i didn't know what to think about what i had just witnessed.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange globe with no sound, 4 to 5 thousand feet in less then 15 seconds then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription:
We were testing some new camera equipment and looking up in the sky and noticed the spheres traveling in a southwest direction directly overhead coming generally from the northeast to the southwest. in all we seen at least 6 and did film 4.   of all that we saw in the 20 minutes or so period only one traveled in a northernly direction.  they all traveled consistantly and maintained regular flight path.  none left contrails or had any flashing lights or strobes.  typical jet airliners were also observed and clearly displayed flashing lights and strobes and contrails on the higher altitude jets.

i have filed other reports recently and was not going to file another but decided to do so, just for that fact that there is something going on up there and it needs to be documented.  i can nearly walk outside any night that the skies are clear and see craft with no flashing lights or strobes.  

my location is about 70 -100 miles outside of chicago in a rural setting.

you can see in the video that 1 or 2 of the craft seen to flare up extra bright and then go dim.   i dont believe these are satelites just becase four passed over in the same flight paths in a matter of minutes.  also satelite flare outs (bright to dim) happens when the solar panel escape the setting sun.  these flare ups went from bright to dim and back and some were dim to bright.  also some of the brighter craft could not be seen with the naked eye.   

in addition to the craft i filmed, one craft raced the entire horizon east to west in about 3-5 seconds, it moved so fast that i could not get the camera on it.  it let 3 lights pulses out that were very very bright and intense.  its last bright pulse light the sky up briefly light a very bright lignting flash.
content.summary: Numerous spheres traveling in the same general direction at very high altitude within minutes

content.detailedDescription: Around eleven oclock pm. i went into my back yard to have a smoke. i noticed a strange light comming from the south it was moving my direction (north) and a little east from me.It kept getting bigger and brighter and i couldnt really tell if it was orange ,yellow or white it kind of did a pulse and the shades of it changed a bit. i knew  something was extremely odd then . i ran inside and got my camcorder.As i got back outside and started filming i zoomed in as close as i could go  and then i realized this thing was not wright. it had what looked like circular swirl marks in or on it and they would change and then it just vanished . the object was over a farm field area. i filmed this with a sony handycam dcr-sr68. this was all odd in itself but,this isnt the first time i saw something strange over here.In your archives i reported another  with video date   6-16-08. same kind of object i believe but 6-16-08 came from the north and not the south. they seem to be vanishing in the same area.The days i video taped them was  3 years and 4 days apart .
content.summary: Close up video of dissapearing ufo

content.detailedDescription: From the age of three i have known that we are not the only humanoid life form. if you were to speak too one,they would speak telapathic.If you plug your ears and talk,you can hear your voice in your head.It sounds almost like that but clearer and stronger.I could write my hole event down but i would rather tell my incounter with someone in mufon not on computer.There is so much i have to say and posibly evidence too be tested
content.summary: Disc shape windows in front 200-300ft long

content.detailedDescription: I had left home to get something to eat at mcdonald's,after i had ordered my food. i had looked up,for the spinning movement caught my attention. as i had looked right at it,it had sat motionless about 100 feet up,right directly above the bp gas sign. all of a sudden when the lady cashiere came to the window to ask for payment of the food; i had looked away from it for a second to pay for the food,it was gone. i fear god almighty,god allpowerful. i thank him for everything. p.S. i live close to fairborn,ohio. home of wright patterson/afb. yours truley gregkporter.
content.summary: A spinning multicolored rotating upsidedown triangle.

content.detailedDescription: I had left home to get something to eat at mcdonald's,after i had ordered my food. i had looked up,for the spinning movement caught my attention. as i had looked right at it,it had sat motionless about 100 feet up,right directly above the bp gas sign. all of a sudden when the lady cashiere came to the window to ask for payment of the food; i had looked away from it for a second to pay for the food,it was gone. i fear god almighty,god allpowerful. i thank him for everything. p.S. i live close to fairborn,ohio. home of wright patterson/afb. yours truley (name deleted)fg.
content.summary: A spinning multicolored rotating upsidedown triangle.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were driving over to another friend's house in liverpool to stay there for the night. it was just my friend and i in the car at the time. as we drove through my neighborhood, i noticed a large ball of light in the sky. it was very bright, which drew my attention. i am a long time believer in extraterrestrial activity, and have been visited before by ufos. my friend was a skeptic and didn't really believe many of the stories i would tell. i pointed out the light to him, and he looked up at it along with me. we first believed it to be an airplane, but it didn't move like one and it definitely  didn't look like one. there were not multiple lights visible on it, just one large ball of gold-ish light. as we watched the ufo, it seemed to sit still in the sky. the two of us began to have feelings of panic and disbelief. it then started to move once we noticed it, and it made somewhat of a u-turn. the light grew larger, and as soon as we contemplated turning down a street to follow it, the light disappeared. i can only describe it as like a light switch turning off. there was no dimming of the light or anything. it just disappeared right in front of us. come to find out, another friend of mine reported seeing the same exact light in rome, ny up at a drive in movie theater.
content.summary: Large ball of light

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home after work, headed down hightower trail into gwinnett co. towards centerville.  we had thunderstorms that evening and the front was just pushing through so the sky was beginning to clear.  i noticed to my right were two "stars" and i realized it was awfully early to start seeing stars.  trouble is, you couldn't see the sky yet, just the clouds but the "stars" were in or in front of the clouds.  as i came around the corner where the landscape dips down giving you a view of the horizon for several miles, i noticed there were actually four "stars" forming a gentle arc.  i quickly picked up my camera and snapped a picture of the objects.  the lights did not move nor blink, they were white stationary points of light, exactly what a star in the night sky looks like.  my camera info shows i snapped the picture about 8:18 pm but my clock in the car read 7:45pm or so.  i watched the objects for about 5 minutes trying to match the objects to anything familiar but could not.  i pulled back onto the road and continued towards home.  by the time i reached the top of the next hill, the objects were gone.  i can't say exactly how long the event lasted since i didn't see when it began but i watched the objects for 5 or 6 minutes.  in that time, the "stars" never moved or blinked, not did they change position at all.
content.summary: Four star like lights seen in sky outside centerville ga

content.detailedDescription:
Sunday june 19th 2011 aprox. 10 pm. southwest lincoln (looking east).

i was trying to capture lightning from a strong thunder storm to the east on a sony cyber-shot 7.2 mp camera. the camera was set on the high sensitivity iso mode.

these green objects were not visible to the naked eye! i only noticed them when the were downloaded to the computer yesterday.

last night i tried to reproduce the images by take more photos at the exact same place and time with the camera set the same way to see if it something like lens flair or some kind of optical illusion. 

over 40 more photos were taken and i could not see a hint of green!
content.summary: Green disks

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i were watching a strange light on a mountaintop just beyond the foothills across the valley from us to the east. it's some reflective something that doesn't belong there, and we've watched it off and on since last year. while we were sitting on the porch, a big black smoking ball came into view from the north, just over the foothills but in front of the mountain where the light was--approximately 2-3 miles away. it trailed black smoke or vapor, stuttered up a bit and down a bit as it flew slowly across, the trail of smoke following it like a snake. it passed behind a tree just across the highway from here, and we fully expected to see it come out the other side above/behind the hills, but it never did. so it must have gone down just beyond those hills. no sound. nada.

if i were to guess its size at a 2-3 mile distance, i'd say it was easily 150-300ft in diameter, not including the tail of smoke. the light on the mountaintop beyond it disappeared while we were watching the black ball, though there was still enough sun to reflect. odd. really really odd.
content.summary: Big round black smoking ball traveling north to south in stuttered flight

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back porch at about 11:40 at night. it wasn't long before i noticed some flashing lights to my left up in the sky. i live near an air force base so i'm used to seeing planes and flashing lights but these lights caught my attention. i observed the two red-orange lights flicker/flash and soon realized they weren't two separate objects, but they were the lights of one craft moving together. i can't quite explain the distance apart, but they were definitely too far apart to be any normal airplane. eventually the lights, which were moving rather fast, became just one light; or shall i say one light disappeared. one light flashed by itself for approximately 15 seconds. as soon as the second light reappeared a third light seemed to flash 2-3 times right behind the first light. that's when my interest really peaked. by this time the lights had traveled pretty far across the sky and that's when i noticed that the two separate lights moving together were actually 1 light spinning in a super fast circle. it also seemed to have a slight slant to it. for the next minute and a half, approximately, the spinning light moved further and further away until it couldn't be seen anymore. what impressed me the most was how fast it made its way across the sky. also, the way the lights flashed/flickered were unlike any flashes i've seen in the sky before. the seemed to skip almost and it became more clear once i realized the two lights were just 1 light spinning fastly around its ship. i first thought it was just an airplane, i see them all the time. but as it made its way across the sky and started turning from 2 to 1 to 3 and back to 2 lights rotating, i figured i was observing something very different. over the past 2 years i have become a believer in et but have still remained a skeptic. i never expected to have my own ufo encounter, and still wonder if it was some unknown military craft or indeed a ufo. i attempted to take a video but my camera isn't the best and i couldnt seem to capture or focus on the lights.
content.summary: 2 flashing red-orange lights that turned into one light and eventually back into two.

content.detailedDescription:
I downloaded a picture of the puyehue volcano at sunset to my wallpaper and noticed numerous objects that don't appear to be camera induced.
the picture is by claudia santana/afp/getty images and can be viewed on line by searching the recent eruption. the objects can be seen in the volacnic ash cloud and in clear air near the horizon. interesting!
content.summary: Ufo's refueling at puyehue volcano, chile

content.detailedDescription: 5 friends and myself all witnessed a star-like object far away from my house and viewed it for around an hour before we were unable to see it anymore (820pm until 915pm). the object was changing hues between yellow, red and blue and moved erratically, but generally away from us. we then decided to all drive to the nearest school rugby field (rondebosch boys' high school) to get a betterview. on the field that object mentioned continued further away from us, however it was definitely not in a regular way and also was definitely visible in an area of sky (low to the horizon) in which no other stars could be seen due to smoggy conditions. the object became more distant and on the way back to our vehicle we spotted a far closer yellow-orangey light moving, as well as an identical object to the one described to the north (opposite direction to the original one we had viewed for more than an hour). the yellow-orange light/object immediately thought by us to be an aeroplane sudde then suddenly changed direction and came toward our direction. it became extremely clear that the object was a bright glowing disc (oval from where we were standing) that quickly disappeared in the direction to the north. after this close sighting of a definite object of superior technology we excitedly all jumped into my friend's car and drove to an even bigger open space around the corner called rondebosch common. when we arrived there at around 1030pm all 3 objects had disappeared.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 ufo's viewed for more than an hour, one close enouugh to make out the shape

content.detailedDescription: Between 11 pm & 1 am, multiple star-like objects flew over the city. two bright objects in particular flew one after the other heading east until they appeared to of stopped moving. several other dim star-like objects sighted. one sighting of likely a military aircraft with a 10 second interval flash followed a dim star-like object heading north.
content.summary: Multiple bright star-like objects flying over the city... a few appeared to of stopped moving

content.detailedDescription:
Ultima hora: ovni muy cerca de un avi���n comercial



nuestro buen amigo (1 name deleted)fg nos comparte esta extraordinaria fotograf���a donde se puede ver un ovni muy cerca de un avi���n comercial.

seg���n los datos proporcionados por el propio fausto, este avistamiento se registro a las 5 de la tarde al norte de la ciudad de m���xico, por las torres de sat���lite.

el (7 name deleted)  nos comenta que el ovni se mov���a en contra de la direcci���n del viento, esto imposibilitar���a que se tratase de un globo, ademas es importante se���alar que fausto abaroa tiene gran experiencia en observar el cielo y por lo tanto sabe perfectamente identificar si se trata de alg���n globo o aparato volador conocido.

por otra parte se���alo en el reporte que este objeto volador no identificado tomo direcci���n hacia el aeropuerto de toluca, perdiendolo as��� de vista, no sin antes lograr una secuencia de 5 fotograf���as perfectamente claras del objeto desconocido.


posteriormente nuestro compa���ero(2 name deleted), t���cnico en aviaci���n pudo identificar el tipo de avi���n que vemos en la imagen, el cual se trata de un embraer.

este reporte sin lugar a dudas plasma el inter���s que tienen estos objetos voladores no identificados por las actividades a���reas civiles y militares.

casos como este podemos encontrar en el libro "ovnis y la aviacion mexicana" escrito por (3 name deleted) , compendio de reportes, fotografias y documentaci���n verdaderamente extraordinaria que ponen de manifiesto la presencia de estos objetos desconocidos en el cielo.

nuestro reconocimientos a nuestro amigo (4 name deleted)fausto abaroa por estas extraordinarias imagenes.

con informaci���n de (5 name deleted) , reporto para c.I.F.E.E.E.A.C., (6 name deleted)fg.


translation:

last time: ufo very close to an airliner 



our good friend (name deleted) he shares this extraordinary photograph of a ufo can be seen close to a commercial aircraft.
 
according to data provided by (name deleted) himself, this sighting was recorded at 5 in the afternoon north of mexico city, the towers of satellite.
 
(name deleted) told us that the ufo was moving against the wind, this would preclude that it were a balloon, it is also important to note that (name deleted) has extensive experience in observing the sky and therefore knows exactly identify whether is a balloon or flying machine known.
 
moreover the report pointed out that this ufo took toward the toluca airport, thus losing sight of, but not before achieving a sequence of 5 photographs of the unknown object perfectly clear.
 

then our friend (name deleted), aviation technician could identify the type of aircraft we see in the image, which is an embraer.
 
this report certainly captures the interest that these unidentified flying objects by the civil and military aviation activities.
 
cases like this can be found in the book "ufos and mexican aviation" by (name deleted) and (name deleted), a compendium of reports, photographs and documents truly extraordinary show the presence of these unknown objects in the sky.
 
our thanks to our friend fausto abaroa by these extraordinary images. 

with information from (name deleted) and (name deleted), reported to cifeeeac, (name deleted.
content.summary: Ovni muy cerca de un avión comercial

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in the garden looking up at the stars when a very low flight of 4 discs flew directly overhead se to nw. discs were low - size of a penny - and in a fluid formation. bright white with a brownish outer rim glow. no navigation lights and moving very fast. caught sight of them for 3-4 seconds before they were obscured by buildings. height - < 1000ft (but maybe lower depending on object size) and silent. i fell out of my chair. unbelievable!
content.summary: 4 flight formation of discs

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were on our back porch smoking (cigs) when we saw two star like objects flying very slow from (i think) a south westerly direction to an easterly (i think) direction, when i first saw them i thought they were big bright stars and that's how my mind registered them at 1st...A couple of seconds later i realized they were moving toward our direction. they were not moving the same direction as the stars. they were big,very bright white and silent one was behind another to its 5 o'clock position. my brother has binoculars and he got them and he says through them he couldn't make out anything but light. i ran inside to get my mother because i wanted her to see them (this took about 15 seconds maybe less) as we stepped out the door he said to our mom look right there and then they were gone, they hadn't been close to being overhead yet. he said in the split second he took the binoculars down and back up to keep looking they were gone, he didn't see how they left, at the speed they were going they still should have been there. he went around the front of the house to see if he could spot them and couldn't. about 10 minutes later we saw (it could have been a satelite but i dont think so) another bright white light heading (i think) south to north it seemed to change speed but also the brightness of it faded away and went from a large bright white dot to a very small one until we couldnt see it anymore. about another 10 minutes later i saw a very small white dot heading again south to north at a steady speed then it took a 90 degree turn north east and out of my viewing range. we saw over the next little while some other small white dots moving around in unregular patterns. i've never seen anything like this and i've seen ufos before. this happened over about the period of an hour between 10:30 and 11:30 eastern daylight time in west roxbury (boston) ma. june 20, 2011.
content.summary: Two star like objects moving slow

content.detailedDescription:
In owasso, ok i was sitting on the back porch facing east around 10pm cst.  i was looking up at the stars and it was very clear.  there were many stars which were averagely lit.  one of the star-looking lights just began to move from a stationary position to about 2 o'clock at a high rate of speed.  while it was moving further away the light just slowly dimmed out. 

it was definitely going too fast to be a conventional aircraft.  this is the first time i've seen anything of a ufo nature.  the thing that irked me was that it was definitely there and completely still before it jetted off.  i'm wondering if anyone in the tulsa area witnessed this on saturday, june 18th, 2011.

sorry but i didn't have anything to film it with and it only lasted about 7 seconds from the time it began moving to the time it faded out into the distance.
content.summary: Bright white star-like moved from stationary to very quick speed

content.detailedDescription: I had just turned right from n byhalia rd onto white rd heading west.  i was accelerating to 30mph and panned my eyes from the evening clouds east of me (where it was becoming dark) to the west where i was heading (no clouds).  toward the west, south-west i noticed a distinct blue glow/light with a white dot at the center.  the object was stationary, and had the shape of a flattened diamond or flattened infinite shape.  i knew it wasn't an airplane (i've grown up around a major airport and i have never seen anything like this and the apparent elevation and size of the object in relation to setting sun ruled out reflection) so i started thinking it was a star but the shape was really inconsistent with that as well.  (i want to make record of this next part although it seems really strange.)  i then had the thought, "i wonder if it knows i see it."  at which point it simply vanished.  almost like if someone was shining a flashlight at you from across a field and then turned the light off without warning.  it was just gone.  there were no other objects in the sky.  no silhouettes, shimmers, nothing.  i continued scanning the area trying to come up with an explanation, the hair started standing up on the back of my neck as i realised i can't explain what i just saw.  i then called my wife and told her "i think i just saw an honest to god ufo."  i'm writing this now to make record as i am trying to recall as much detail as possible and i am going to return to the site tomorrow and try and get some pictures and reference points to see if i can come up with an explanation for what i saw.
content.shape: Diamond,   Disc,   Oval,   Sphere,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Blue stationary light with white point at center dissappeared suddenly

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside on my patio when i saw two bright objects flying somewhat fast and slow down. i ran to grab my camera because i noticed these things flying in an odd formation and leaving a contrail, and not some sort of chemtrail.  i never really looked at the film until now.  it is in hd format. you can clearly see 1 orb materialize in the middle of the screen at 00:00:04 and start to spiral vertically.  00:00:05 a second orb is seen on the left side of the screen moving at a linear path to the right of the screen.  00:00:06 1 orb vanishes before it leaves the right of the screen.  a few milliseconds later the vertical one disappears.  00:00:07 camera starts to blur out and the bright one on the bottom vanishes?  i stopped filming,  i get images everyday now, i woke up with my camera in ir mode and sony says its not possible on that camera sony dsc-w370,  i don't know where the information came from but the next day i used my night vision goggles in the dark with the white balance one button push setting and figured it out.  the day this happened i had the same feeling that i was meant to see it or told to.
content.summary: Two discs flying and two orbs.  one orb performs a spiral the other passes through the middle of it.  then they all vanish.

content.detailedDescription:
Langley, bc canada: i was travelling home from a late university project march 17, 2011 and i was waiting at a bus transfer stop in langley when i noticed two low-flying aircraft. i initially ignored as regular air traffic until i realized that the light configuration was completely wrong.

both objects had the same configuration of a single red light on what i determined to be the nose of the craft and one white light on the rear a fair distance from, and positioned a bit lower to the ground than the nose light. the only difference between the crafts was the lead vessel's red light pulsed at about 2hz while the second one's red light was more of a blink at about 1hz.

the fuselage was difficult to see due to the time of day and the bright lights on it, but it should have still been bright enough outside to see a conventional plane fairly well. instead all i could see was a vaguely cigar shape lacking an upright tail fin, wings, or any sign of a cockpit, and seeming to be slightly fatter in the middle while still being aerodynamic. it also seemed to have some protruding instruments on the underside and a bulbous part on which the rear white light was attached. this was particularly difficult to see due to the colour of the craft which seemed to be blacker than the sky around the object and seemed very slick as it made my eye slip off it constantly and seemed to blur the outline so that it blended into the sky. sort of like waving a magnifying glass in front of you while you're looking at the sky and it bends the light. the lights were the only reason it was easy to track.

the lead object had come into view first followed by the second so they each moved independently; however once settling into a very close single-file formation [about 2 of these craft could fit end to end between them] they flew in perfect formation flying west at a relatively slow speed for the remainder of the sighting. 

they were only flying maybe a couple hundred feet in the air and not too far in the distance but throughout the whole pass there was complete silence from these things. no propeller noise, jet sound, or humming at all. 

but strangely this is the weirdest part. just as the lead vessel was beginning to drop altitude and was approaching some trees which would obscure it from behind me in the opposite direction was the sound of what i feel was multiple jet engines. i've been to many airshows and this sounded exactly the same as a small number of jets doing maneuvers at a fairly high altitude. i couldn't see anything at all when i looked for them though, no beacon lights or commercial traffic at all. 

20 seconds after first hearing the jets i looked back at the ufos the lead vessel simply vanished before reaching the trees. it's lights went out and the dark fuselage was simply gone. the second ufo however was still there for about 10 seconds and i was watching it closely since i didn't know if the first ufo vanishing had been a trick of the eye. it maintained it's original course and speed and sure enough upon reaching approximately where the lead vessel had been it too vanished. [it is important to note that in the west there was still some light from the setting sun so it's not like the craft simply turned off it's light beacons and flew off.] 

the lights on the ship went dark immediately but watching the second ufo it's outline remained there for a tiny amount of time as well before just vanishing completely. after this i still heard the jets pass straight over me in the direction where the objects had vanished before coming about and circling a few times before heading south and fading away. again i never had a visual contact on any of these jets, although several other people who were listening also agreed that it couldn't be a commercial jet. 

immediately after this event while i was trying to figure out what happened was when i connected this with another strange thing i had seen in the same location a few weeks earlier when again, two ufo's of the same profile appeared at about the altitude but maybe a bit further away. however during this sighting they were flying at speeds far greater than what they displayed march 17 and to me seemed impressive speed at that distance for a military fighter to match. one came in from the west diving at about a 30 degree inclination, while the second came from the east diving at about a 45 degree inclination. 

they appeared to be at approximately the same distance from me and their flight paths crossed perfectly both of the crafts missing by what seemed like a couple meters. at the bottom of the dive one craft vanished still going very fast while the other made an 80 degree course correction and continued flying at the same speed. 

that's basically it, i haven't been back there for a while so i haven't seen them again but i'll definitely be looking.
content.summary: Two ufo's in formation did a flyby then vanished without a trace over langley british columbia, march 2011

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work, looking at the road, when i saw a moving object in the sky in my peripheral vision. i looked up very quickly because i thought it was a satellite or a shooting star, but to my surprise it was much, much too large to be either, much bigger than a plane reflecting light from something. it was incredibly eery and i didn't know what to think because i'd never seen anything like it or believed i ever would. to put it simply i was astounded. i gawked at it as it moved quickly from the center of my vision, where i first saw it descending, into the tree line and disappeared. it was also unlike any color i'd ever seen in the sky, like a very bright greenish blue, almost white. i felt very creeped out in a crazy way after this event.
content.summary: Very large, greenish blue ball of light moving quickly through the sky in a straight line.

content.detailedDescription:
I was running around the track at  the kent state univ. stark campus on sat. night, june 18th around 10:15 pm or so. my husband and daughter were also there standing on the hill and watching the jackson township fireworks at the park while i was running. about halfway throught he fireworks, i noticed an orange ball of light seemingly moving towards the fireworks in the sky. this is near the akron canton airport and at first i thought it was just a very near-by plane heading for the airport but getting very close to the fireworks. then it suddenly disappeared. it struck me then that it had not looked like the ususal plane lights we always see when running up there and it also looked larger and very round and bright orange too, unlike all the other planes flying by.

so then about 15 minutes later, i was still running around the track and they already had had the fireworks finale and then right after it we suddenly saw the same kind of orange balls of light again  in the sky only this time there were three of them and they were in a crooked but vertical line in the sky and seemed to be closer now and almost moving towards us, this time quite a ways away from the fireworks area in the sky. i ran over to where my husband and daughter were sitting and said "what are those things?" and my husband said he didn't know but they were very strange! we have never seen anything like them before in our lives.

so we watched them in the sky then. my husband and daughter remained sitting while i kept running while we all watched them and then suddenly they just disappeared behind some trees. 

i did call a friend of mine who is a jackson cop and he was working at the festival that night. i aksed him if he saw them or if they had any reports of odd balls of orange lights in the sky but he said no. he then suggested i call the nearby airport and check with them but i have not yet had a chance to do that.

since i am a certified ufo investigator for mufon myself, i wanted to make this report mainly just in case someone else might report the same thing that we saw that night in the same area.
content.summary: Orange round balls seen in sky near community festival and fireworks event

content.detailedDescription: While staying the weekend in our vacation cabin, my wife & i were out on the deck looking up at the stars. (facing south east) it is hard to see the whole sky there, since there are many trees, but almost directly over us is a good clearing.  it was just before midnight and one star caught my eye, because it looked like it was flickering, almost like a candle flame. as i stared, i noticed it was not a single flickering star - it was a single light that was getting brighter and dimmer, but also with several smaller lights immediately around it that were flashing randomly and sporadically. these lights were much dimmer & hard to see next to the center bright light. it seemed to move slightly side to side & my wife was noticing the color change slightly from bright white to a hue of reddish, back to white, then greenish, and back to white again. by slightly, i mean the overall color had a reddish or greenish tint to it - the main light was still white. it only moved slightly side to side - almost unnoticeable, then would hold stationary.  we watched for about 4 minutes and saw the light move in small circles, up, down, etc., but still staying in the same relative area.  it stayed just above the tree from our view.  i then noticed a second similar light to the right of this one. it appeared & got a little brighter and dimmer like the first. as we watched both, they seemed to be moving exactly the same, as if attached.  within 30 seconds, my wife saw a third light just like the other 2 & it was already in motion or sync with the other 2 lights.  this third light appeared more above the second light, but when looking at all 3 together, if you connected the dots, it made an equilateral triangle shape. i attempted a picture, but there was too much light interference. i wasn't scared, but kind of excited and nervous. at this time, my dog started howling - which i thought was weird, because he was inside the house & i have only heard him howl one other time.  i went inside & he looked freaked out- eyes bugged out, ears down & shaking. i took him out to go potty, hoping that's all he needed.  when i was out with my dog, i walked him down the south walkway & looked out between a clearing of trees from our driveway. i saw a very bright light (to the south west) it was moving the same as the others, but looked bigger, brighter, and closer, so the movements were more obvious. it would almost jump to the left, then up and to the right, bouncing & stopping.  after about a minute, the light faded out to nearly nothing. as this light faded, another light to the right of this one appeared and got brighter.  then, this second light faded & the first one got brighter again.  they did this back and forth a few times. i didn't see the second light move, it was stationary and didn't get quite as big/bright as the other.  the first light only seemed to move when it lit up. after it dimmed out, it would again illuminate in the same place, then move around, then stop, and fade out as the other one got brighter. my wife could not witness this second sighting because her neck was messed up from looking up for too long.  i checked back on the first 3 lights & they were still in place.  we agreed we were being watched over & called it a night! my dog is fine, but had to sleep under the covers with us!
content.summary: 3 small lights appearing, then moving in sync with each other in a hovering triangular shape.  then 2 more lights to the southwest.

content.detailedDescription: These were not flares, last night was a lunar eclipse i am sure i was not the only one seeing onto the skies. the 3 disappearing lights were bright white/amber and red-ish. they seem to be appearing at tip of south mountain about 2 miles east from the red light pole-radio antennas on south mountian. they joined & separated at one point. the lights also flashed on and off with continuous elevation/not loosing altitude etc. they lasted about 10-15 minutes. at one point one became super super bright as if it was exploding and diminished into a small dot in the sky. my entire family saw this and we were amazed. please write back if you have seen the same or know anything about this specific sighting on sunday night 06/17/2011. location was south mountain phoenix az.
content.summary: South mountain phoenix lights 06/17/11 incredible

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were camping in brazos bend state park in december 2010. i was sitting next to the campfire and just gazing up in the sky because of the beauty. i noticed a slow moving red/orange light moving nw to se. during the evening i observed a constant jet flight pattern moving ne to sw so i was caught by this light moving the opposite way. as i watched it moving towards us i could see it was not high flying like the jets. i called my wife out from the camping shelter to take a look at the light. i just seemed different, out of place and was completely silent. i estimate it was about a 1/2 - a mile away but it was just a guess. as we were observing it the light just seemed to stop and grow sharp in focus then fuzzy. i grabbed my binoculars and that was when i saw that it was triangle shaped with its lights. two on the bottom and one on top. we saw it for about 10 minutes when all of a sudden it just started to ascend up into the sky and slightly away, where it just faded out of observation. we went back to the campfire and talked about what we had just seen. my wife went back into the shelter while i kept the fire going. about 10 minutes later another object with light came from the same nw to se pattern but the light was more reddish. it followed the same path, coming to the estimated 1/2 to one mile distance and did the same thing as it got very sharp and then fuzzy. after about 10 minutes it also ascended up and slightly away until it was not observable. i used my binoculars again when i saw it and the element was the same, two light on bottom and one on top. we were really excited as we thought we saw something odd. about 20 minutes later another object/light appeared again moving nw to se but ther lights this time were back to the orange/reddish. it stopped again about 1/2 mile to one mile away. this time the duration was short, maybe 5 minutes but then when it ascended straight up in the sky it was almost instantly out of sight. there were no more after that and i am now still awed by what we saw.
content.summary: Slow moving orang/red light moving nw to se then stopping above glowing sharp(triangle) before asending up and away
